divs: sighting detailsi am 39 years old now and i had my encounter when i was about 8 years old. i have never really talked about this incident to my family or anyone else. i did mention it to my wife a few years back and she kids me about it but believes i did see something special. the reason i want to log this info is because i believe that telepathic communication is the reason i had my sighting. for whatever reason that night i saw a ufo, i was looking out of my back window of my kitchen window hoping to see a ufo. i remember my eyes being glued to the backyard sky for some reason. i clearly saw a disc shaped craft fly effortlessly up towards my house. we lived in a rural\suburban neighborhood with 5 acres. the craft flew up very quickly and hovered over our small barn about 150 yards from the house. it then flew right up within 25 yards of my house where i was still sitting in the kitchen. the craft made no sound at all and moved like nothing i had ever seen before. i had a strong feeling that there was a kind of communication or mutual acknowledgement of the encounter. the craft made a small manuver across the window. i then turned back to yell for my mom but i didn't for some reason. i looked back to the window and saw the craft start moving out and it zipped away from the path it came. the speed of it's exit was incredible and like a straight streak of dim light. the best description that i can remember was that the craft was disc shaped, maybe 40-50 ft in size, black or dark gray colored with dim glow. i definitely saw a craft, not from this planet, that night and it definitely had a lifeforce that knew i was there. i just wanted to get this logged finally. because i wanted to see a ufo that night can make this encounter seem less credible or more credible since i feel telepathy had everything to do with it. only i know what i saw that night and i know it was as real as i am.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Delaware
There were no other sightings in Delaware on or around November 30th 1975
